messages.alpha: Поле {_field_} может содержать только буквенные символы
messages.alpha_num: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: The {_field_} field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: The {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.between: The {_field_} field must be between {min} and {max}
messages.confirmed: The {_field_} field confirmation does not match
messages.digits: The {_field_} field must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
messages.dimensions: The {_field_} field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
messages.email: The {_field_} field must be a valid email
messages.excluded: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
messages.ext: The {_field_} field is not a valid file
messages.image: The {_field_} field must be an image
messages.integer: The {_field_} field must be an integer
messages.max_value: The {_field_} field must be {max} or less
messages.max: The {_field_} field may not be greater than {length} characters
messages.mimes: The {_field_} field must have a valid file type
messages.min_value: The {_field_} field must be {min} or more
messages.min: The {_field_} field must be at least {length} characters
messages.numeric: The {_field_} field may only contain numeric characters
messages.oneOf: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
messages.size: The {_field_} field size must be less than {size}KB
messages.decimal: The {_field_} field must contain only decimal values

staking.title: WorkQuest Staking
staking.desc: Make your assets work. Stake your assets into DeFi staking or Locked staking to increase staking income.

pension.title: Retirement program
pension.desc: You can select a percentage of each completed quest which will then be automatically credited to your retirement account, or simply deposit an amount of your choice. The pool of funds is invested on the employee's behalf, and the earnings on the investments generate income to the worker upon their retirement.

referral.title: Referral program
referral.desc: Refer & Earn is our scheme that lets you earn rewards  for every friend you refer who becomes a customer and subsequently completes a quest. Your referred friends save, too, by getting a free registration.

p2p.title: P2P insurance
p2p.desc: Peer-to-peer (P2P) insurance is a product that allows a group of insureds to pool their capital, self-organize, and self-administer their own insurance. The core idea of P2P is that a set of like-minded people with mutual interests group their insurance policies together introducing a sense of control, trust, and transparency while at the same time reducing costs. This model of insurance combines traditional pooling and sharing of losses with current technology and innovations, providing a product for increasingly savvy consumers who require transparency in an on-demand economy.

savings.title: Savings product
savings.desc: A cryptocurrency savings account gives you access to the cryptocurrency market while allowing you to earn interest like a traditional bank savings account does. If you're interested in long-term cryptocurrency investing, a crypto savings account can help you accrue interest while keeping your coins safe.

crediting.title: Lending
crediting.desc: Similar to a traditional loan, the crypto loan amount is deposited in the borrower's bank account and then the borrower pays EMIs to the lender. Once the amount is paid back in full, the lender releases the collateral that acted as security.

mining.title: Liquidity mining
mining.desc: is a DeFi (decentralized finance) mechanism in which participants supply cryptocurrencies into liquidity pools, and being rewarded with fees and tokens based on their share of the total pool liquidity.
